item.title: TIL MPI_Comm_spawn
item.description: (This post assumes prior experience with MPI). You may already be familiar with the pattern of using fork and exec to spawn a new process from the the current program. If you’re not, this Wikipedia page has a good summary of it. Essentially, you can make your program clone itself at a particular point in the program i.e. creating the “child” process, and then replace the clone with a completely different program erasing any trace of the original program.
